scripts.transform-light: npx token-transformer bw-styles/src/tokens/figmaTokens transformed/tokens/output/light.json reference,system,BluePrint reference --expandTypography
scripts.transform-dark: npx token-transformer bw-styles/src/tokens/figmaTokens transformed/tokens/output/dark.json reference,systemDark,BluePrint reference --expandTypography
scripts.transform-test: npx token-transformer bw-styles/src/tokens/figmaTokens transformed/tokens/output/lightTest.json reference,system,BluePrint,test reference --expandTypography
scripts.transform: npm run transform-light && npm run transform-dark
scripts.build-tokens: cd bw-styles/src/tokens && node buildTokens.js && cd ../../ && mv transformed/tokens/output/scss/light.scss ./src/scss/_theme.scss && mv src/tokens/output/scss/dark.scss ./src/scss/_themeDark.scss
